name: FEDERATION OF SRI LANKAN LOCAL GOVERNMENT AUTHORITIES
goal: FSLGA is working towards strengthening the local government authorities in Sri Lanka. Our objectives include coordinate a unified approach among Local Govt. Bodies to resolve common issues. we also aim to incrase the voices and effective participation of councilors I LAs in planning and development and decision making within the framework of participatory democracy.  Establishing a good relationship with the Central and Provincial Govts. in the shared interests of all levels of governments and the citizens of sri lanka.
interests: Climate Action, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives:
Transparent and predictable working conditions to all. Employees are provided with good working environment, job security and consistency in payment of Salaries and Wages in par with the market standards. Employees are paid fringe benefits and insurance protection. Working hours are restricted with adequate time off and holidays to maintain work-life balance;
Youth employment - Priority is given to youth in as an entry point to career in Governance field. More than 50% of workforce is youth below 35 years of age. Youth are given career guidance, training opportunities, upward career path, competitive remuneration and decision making powers.
